text: Throughout #MilitaryAppreciationMonth we reflect on the tremendous sacrifices of our service members past & present & pay respects to them & their families. The U.S. is indebted to them for their service.More:

On #NationalArmedForcesDay we proudly salute the men & women in all five branches of the United States military. Our country is proud to recognize & thank these patriots & defenders of freedom. Thank you for your service!
Congratulations to #OK04's own Sooners Geothermal Team from @UofOklahoma for winning @ENERGY's 2022 Geothermal Collegiate Competition! Great job and #BoomerSooner! #FourthDistrictFriday
